mapper.select: select co.color_name, si.size_name, it.item_name, it.item_no from stock st inner join size si inner join color co inner join item it where st.size_no = si.size_no and st.color_no = co.color_no and it.item_no = st.item_no and st.stock_no = #{stock_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE stock SET amount=#{amount} WHERE stock_no=#{stock_no}
mapper.select: select si.size_no, si.size_name from stock s inner join size si where si.size_no=s.size_no AND item_no=#{item_no} AND color_no=#{color_no} AND s.amount>0
